question: If no long sura's are known, can I read 2 or 3 short sura's in one rakaat, eg. in Fajr salaat
answer:
QUESTION

If no long sura's are known, can I read 2 or 3 short sura's in one rakaat, eg. in Fajr salaat

ANSWER


Share:

Respected Brother-in-Islam

Assalaamu Alaykum Wa Rahmatullaahi Wa Barakaatuhu

It is permissible to recite different short Surahs in one Rakaat of any
Salaat, including Fajr Salaat.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
